members.name: description

constantValues: Shows information about the social post content. This field is read-only.

members.description: Shows information about the social post content. This field is read-only.

members.name: stateCode

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

constantValues: Shows whether the social activity completed. This field is read-only.

members.description: Shows whether the social activity completed. This field is read-only.

addSupportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'stateCode_display' is added to the 'SocialActivity' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'stateCode'
addSupportingAttribute.name: stateCode_display

members.name: statusCode

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupCorrelatedValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder, correlatedValue}

constantValues: Shows whether the social activity is completed, failed, or processing. This field is read-only.

members.description: Shows whether the social activity is completed, failed, or processing. This field is read-only.

addSupportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'statusCode_display' is added to the 'SocialActivity' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'statusCode'
addSupportingAttribute.name: statusCode_display

foreignKeyAttribute.name: id

constantValues: Choose the local currency for the record to make sure budgets are reported in the correct currency.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Choose the local currency for the record to make sure budgets are reported in the correct currency.

members.name: exchangeRate

constantValues: Shows the conversion rate of the record's currency. The exchange rate is used to convert all money fields in the record from the local currency to the system's default currency.

members.description: Shows the conversion rate of the record's currency. The exchange rate is used to convert all money fields in the record from the local currency to the system's default currency.

foreignKeyAttribute.explanation: Place holder that merges with the better attribute description from the ActivityCommon entity
foreignKeyAttribute.name: id

members.name: sentimentValue

constantValues: Value derived after assessing words commonly associated with a negative, neutral, or positive sentiment that occurs in a social post. Sentiment information can also be reported as numeric values.

members.description: Value derived after assessing words commonly associated with a negative, neutral, or positive sentiment that occurs in a social post. Sentiment information can also be reported as numeric values.

members.name: postURL

constantValues: Shows the URL of the post.

members.description: Shows the URL of the post.

members.name: inResponseTo

constantValues: Unique identifier for the responses to a post. For internal use only.

members.description: Unique identifier for the responses to a post. For internal use only.

members.name: postMessageType

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

constantValues: Shows if the social post originated as a private or public message.

members.description: Shows if the social post originated as a private or public message.

addSupportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'postMessageType_display' is added to the 'SocialActivity' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'postMessageType'
addSupportingAttribute.name: postMessageType_display

members.name: postId

constantValues: Unique identifier of the post. For internal use only.

members.description: Unique identifier of the post. For internal use only.

members.name: threadId

constantValues: Unique identifier of the social conversation. For internal use only.

members.description: Unique identifier of the social conversation. For internal use only.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: id

constantValues: Last SLA that was applied to this Social Activity. This field is for internal use only.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Last SLA that was applied to this Social Activity. This field is for internal use only.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: id

constantValues: Shows the author of the post on the corresponding social channel.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Shows the author of the post on the corresponding social channel.

members.name: postToProfileId

constantValues: Shows the recipients of the social post.

members.description: Shows the recipients of the social post.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: postAuthorAccount

constantValues: Shows the parent account of the author of the post.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Shows the parent account of the author of the post.

selectedTypeAttribute.name: postAuthorAccountType

constantValues: The type of post author account, either Account or Contact.

selectedTypeAttribute.description: The type of post author account, either Account or Contact.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: postAuthor

constantValues: Shows the contact or account that authored the post.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Shows the contact or account that authored the post.

selectedTypeAttribute.name: postAuthorType

constantValues: The type of post author, either Account or Contact.

selectedTypeAttribute.description: The type of post author, either Account or Contact.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: id

constantValues: Choose the service level agreement (SLA) that you want to apply to the Social Activity record.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Choose the service level agreement (SLA) that you want to apply to the Social Activity record.

members.name: onHoldTime

constantValues: Shows how long, in minutes, that the record was on hold.

members.description: Shows how long, in minutes, that the record was on hold.

members.name: lastOnHoldTime

constantValues: Contains the date and time stamp of the last on hold time.

members.description: Contains the date and time stamp of the last on hold time.
